item.title: finance.google.com
item.description: Google just launched it’s new financial website, finance.google.com. It combines a lot of information in 1 page and the adjustable graph at the top of a stock’s page is just WAY cool. You can focus in on any period of time and see news & reports from that period. They’ve also added blog posts as a news source. It’s the ideal place to get a quick snapshot of a stock. Lots of information in a very quick-loading page.
